channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 15:32 Air alarm to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 15:32 Air alarm to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast follow the following messages.#Dnepropetrovsk_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 15:13 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Mirovskaya Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Mirovskaya Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. item.title: 🟠 14:03 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
